channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airbnb Has Changed: Make More Money Even with Regulations & New Competition
item.description: Airbnb has changed, and if you don’t change with it, you could see your income start to dwindle. The good news? If you get ahead of the curve, you could […]

item.title: Pearl raises $58M to help dentists make better diagnoses using AI
item.description: Dental care is a necessity, yet many patients lack confidence in their dentists’ ability to provide accurate diagnoses and appropriate treatments. Some dentists over treat patients, leading to unnecessary expenses, while others may miss critical issues that could develop into more significant and costly problems in the future. While seeking a second opinion from another […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 5 Things to Know About Kamala Harris’ Criminal Justice Record
item.description: Here’s where Vice President Kamala Harris, a former prosecutor, stands on important criminal justice issues.

item.title: “Snowballing” to 12 Doors in 4 Years & Replacing TWO Six-Figure Salaries
item.description: Owning rentals could help you become financially free, afford you more time with family, and allow you to travel the world. Whether you’re stuck in a career you dislike or […]

item.title: Spanish startup Exoticca raises a €60M Series D for its tour packages platform
item.description: Exoticca’s platform connects flights, hotels, meals, transfers, transportation and more, plus the local companies at the destinations. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Project 2025 Plans for Trump to Have Unprecedented Power Over the Justice Department
item.description: The policy plan for a second Trump term would turn the department against progressive local prosecutors.

item.title: Seeing Greene: Should I Start Flipping Houses in My Market? (How to Know)

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg imagines content creators making AI clones of themselves
item.description: Content creators are busy people. Most spend more than 20 hours a week creating new content for their respective corners of the web. That doesn’t leave much time for audience engagement. But Mark Zuckerberg, Meta’s CEO, thinks that AI could solve this problem. In an interview with internet personality Rowan Cheung, Zuckerberg laid out his […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Jules and Samantha
item.description: Jules and Samantha Werkheiser fought their wrongful convictions for over a decade. Here’s their journey of survival — and motherhood — in pictures.

item.title: 2 Money Moves We’re Making TODAY to Prepare for a Potential Recession
item.description: Are we in a recession? Are we headed for a recession? No one knows for certain, but you can never be too prepared for an economic downturn. Are you saving […]

item.title: Elon Musk sets new date for Tesla robotaxi reveal, calls everything beyond autonomy ‘noise’
item.description: Elon Musk says he will show off Tesla’s purpose-built “robotaxi” prototype during an event October 10, after scrapping a previous plan to reveal it August 8. Musk said Tesla will also show off “a couple of other things,” but didn’t explain what that meant. The comments, made on Tesla’s second-quarter earnings call Tuesday, largely confirms […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in This New Podcast Series
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: Here’s Why Real Estate Investors Are Turning to ATMs For Diversification
item.description: As real estate conditions continue to tighten, investors are turning to ATMs for steady cash flow.

item.title: Alphabet to invest another $5B into Waymo
item.description: Alphabet will spend an additional $5 billion on its self-driving subsidiary, Waymo, over the next few years, according to Ruth Porat, the company’s chief financial officer. Porat announced the commitment to a new “multi-year investment” Tuesday during Alphabet’s second-quarter earnings call. “This new round of funding, which is consistent with recent annual investment levels, will […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know About J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice
item.description: On immigration and more, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.
